name: Simple Mailing List
author: Julian Widya Perdana

sections.description:
Retrieve all email addresses stored on your databases of comments and show it on both ordered list and comma separated data.

Then, what’s next if the email is retrieved from the database? Of course you can do manual email marketing with that kind of comma seaparated addresses to send
sections.installation:
1. Upload the zipped file to yoursite/wp-content/plugins
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: Retrieve all email addresses stored on your databases of comments and show it on both ordered list and comma separated data.
